text: Josh Adam Klinghoffer (born October 3, 1979) is an American musician. He is best known as being the guitarist of the Red Hot Chili Peppers from 2009 to 2019. Category:20th-century American guitarists Category:21st-century American musicians Category:1979 births Category:American rock guitarists Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:Red Hot Chili Peppers members
title: Josh Klinghoffer
